page.title: 09Farms in our area.
page.content: The farms in our immediate area breed cows, sheep and pigs and many more animals. There are about three to four farms in Dorchester and here are some of them: Poundbury farm and Middle Farm. I think that Poundbury farm is the largest farm as the fields are very large. The field nearest to the end, by Poundbury estate, has a stile.There are footpaths across the fields for people to use.The fields nearest to the farmhouse and the railway bridge are not accessible to the public. Poundbury farm is kept in very good condition and so are the animals. There is a river running through the farm which looks dusty and very murky.
